details.display-value: The Wordmark Fitted Hat is designed with style in mind. It features the Vestri wordmark across the front with Flexfit built in for a comfortable fit.
details.name: summary
details.value: The Wordmark Fitted Hat is designed with style in mind. It features the Vestri wordmark across the front with Flexfit built in for a comfortable fit.

details.display-value:
The CR550 diecast scale model was officially commissioned by Vestri.  Every detail was meticulously overseen directly by the Vestri Design Team in California.

The same 3D CAD data used to manufacture the actual Model S was used to precisely replicate every detail, curve and surface found in the scale model.
details.name: summary
details.value:
The CR550 diecast scale model was officially commissioned by Vestri.  Every detail was meticulously overseen directly by the Vestri Design Team in California.

The same 3D CAD data used to manufacture the actual Model S was used to precisely replicate every detail, curve and surface found in the scale model.

details.display-value: Stay warm and dry in this wind and water resistant jacket, perfect for cool and rainy climates. Designed for high activity, this Thermolite Active-insulated jacket is 94% polyester and 6% spandex, with a detachable hood. Reflective Vestri logos are printed on the front and back of the jacket, with a reflective stripe on the center front zipper closure and pockets. Custom logo ‘T’ zipper. Zip chest pocket with hand-warming liners and bonded tape styling. Adjustable drawstring system at hem. MP3 cord holder.
